question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_user_health_loan_value()] [Arithmetic Overflow] When accumulating loan values at line 141 with 'value = value + loan_value', can this overflow if user has borrowed many different assets with high values?
